modmenu.descriptionTranslation.twd-sasf:
Fixed the "unknown host" bug caused by the server address containing spaces at the beginning and end of the server address when adding a server or connecting directly
Tip: If you need to use the configuration menu, install the YetAnotherConfigLib mod
option.thewhitedog9487.twd-sasf.ModEnabl: Whether To Enable The Mod Feature
There is no need to restart the game, and the modification will take effect immediately after it is saved
